ReferenceData.String:
SYNOPSIS
gmx [-[no]longboolean] [-dvec <vector>] [-string <string>]
OPTIONS
Other options:
-[no]longboolean (yes) Boolean option with a long name -dvec <vector> (1.135 2.32 3.2132) Double vector option -string <string> (A very long string value that overflows even the description column Another very long string value that overflows even the description column) String option with very long values (may be less relevant with selections having their own option type)
